file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-40-12-06 - EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE FORWARD FUSELAGE II (LOWER SIDE) - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE FORWARD FUSELAGE II (LOWER SIDE) - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do a detailed inspection of the EWIS components in forward fuselage II, cockpit lower side. B. Related Zones: 123/124. C. Zone Boundaries ( AMM MPP 06-41-00/100 AMM MPP 06-41-00/100) . D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE FORWARD ALL 05-40-12-200-801-A ♦ FUSELAGE II (COCKPIT LOWER SIDE)- DETAILED INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-40-12 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-40-12-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE FORWARD FUSELAGE II (COCKPIT LOWER SIDE)- DETAILED INSPECTION A. General (1) This procedure obeys the EWIS ICA requirement. (2) This task gives the instructions to do SMRD Task Number: 20-00-00-220-010-A00. (3) You must do the detailed inspection of the forward fuselage II, at zones 123/124, in the EWIS components of the power cables. (4) Avoid unlacing or displacing the electrical wirings and components, during the detailed visual inspections. (5) Avoid disconnecting the electrical connectors, during the detailed visual inspections. (6) Refer to the Preparation subtask for access panel information. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-803-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-803-A/400 - AMM TASK 53-01-01-000-801-A/400 COCKPIT FLOOR PANELS - REMOVAL AMM TASK 53-01-01-400-801-A/400 COCKPIT FLOOR PANELS - INSTALLATION WM 20-22-00 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 221 Cockpit floor panel 222 Cockpit floor panel D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Flashlight To make the inspection of the area easier Standard Ladder To get access to the area EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-40-12 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward fuselage II - cockpit bottom I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Identify the cockpit floor panels of forward fuselage II, at sub-zone 220 (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100), that give access to zones 123/124. (2) Remove the cockpit floor panels of forward fuselage II, at sub zone 220 ( AMM TASK 53-01-01-000-801-A/400) that give access to zones 123/124. (3) Remove, if necessary, the thermoacoustic insulation from forward fuselage II, at zones 123/124 (AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-801-A/400, AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-802-A/400 or AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-803-A/400, as applicable). J. EWIS Components in the Forward Fuselage II (Cockpit Lower Side)- Detailed Inspection (Figure 601) SUBTASK 220-002-A (1) Do an internal detailed inspection on the power cables, wiring bundles, and connected EWIS components in the Forward Fuselage II, cockpit lower sides, for signs of damage, adequate installation, chafing and general condition. Refer to WM 20-22-00. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) If the thermoacoustic insulation was previously removed, install it at zones 123/124 (AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-801-A/400, AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-802-A/400 or AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-803-A/400, as applicable). (2) Install the cockpit floor panels of forward fuselage II, at sub-zone 220 ( AMM TASK 53-01-01-400-801-A/400), that give access to zones 123/124.
